title: Delta
content:
This indicator Delta shows the delta value for each bar, the difference between market buys and sells.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Visualization

NameDescription
Visual Mode The visual mode setting determines how selections are displayed on the chart

Options:
  • Candles
  • High-Low
  • Histogram
  • Bars
Minimized mode In this mode, all histogram elements are displayed above the zero line.
Show value Determines whether to display the current value of the data series on the price panel.

Drawing

NameDescription
Panel Determines the display location of the indicator: it can either integrate within the main chart area or appear on a separate panel below the chart.
Absorption Dots Visualization settings for calculation results

Properties
NameDescription
Show value
Visible
Scale
Up candle color
Down candle color
Candle Border
Text Color
Mode
Options:
  • Candles
  • Bars
Draw above priceDetermines whether the visual elements are drawn above or below the price data on a chart. When enabled, it overlays the indicator's graphics over the price plot.
Ignored by alertsSpecifies whether the value of this data series should be ignored by the alerts set for drawing objects.
Bullish color Displays the color of an element with a positive value.
Bearish color Displays the color of an element with a negative value.
Neutral border color Represents the color used for neutral values

Filters

NameDescription
Bars direction Determines the direction of the candles.

Options:
  • Any
  • Bullish
  • Bearish
Delta type Specifies the delta type: positive, negative, or both.

Options:
  • Any
  • Positive
  • Negative
Filter Delta volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Show divergence Determines whether to display divergence, which occurs when the direction of the bar and the delta value are opposite: in the case of a bullish bar, the delta is negative, and in the case of a bearish bar, the delta is positive.
Show absorption dots Display dots when the distance between the delta close and high/low exceeds a threshold
Absorption threshold Minimum distance between the close and the delta extremes to consider absorption

Volume values

NameDescription
Show Show volume values on bars (in cluster mode)
Color Sets the color of the label text.
Location Specifies the display location of the label.

Options:
  • Up
  • Middle
  • Down
Font Specifies various settings for the font.

Up alert

NameDescription
Use Alert When activated, an alert is triggered in the presence of a ascending signal, utilizing the specified sound file name.
Filter Sets the value at which the alert is triggered.

Down alert

NameDescription
Use Alert When activated, an alert is triggered in the presence of a downstream signal, utilizing the specified sound file name.
Filter Sets the value at which the alert is triggered.

Alerts

NameDescription
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.
Font Color Sets the color of the text in the alert window.
Background Sets the background color of the alert window.

Misc

NameDescription
Show description The parameter controls the visibility of the indicator's name and its parameters on the chart, enabling the display of this information to be toggled on or off.
